SELECT con_num, lec_name, con_name, video_id, CONCAT( IF(HOUR(SEC_TO_TIME(con_play_time)) > 0, CONCAT(HOUR(SEC_TO_TIME(con_play_time)), '시간 '), ''), IF(MINUTE(SEC_TO_TIME(con_play_time)) > 0, CONCAT(MINUTE(SEC_TO_TIME(con_play_time)), '분 '), ''), IF(SECOND(SEC_TO_TIME(con_play_time)) > 0, CONCAT(SECOND(SEC_TO_TIME(con_play_time)), '초'), '') ) AS duration_time FROM contents_manage WHERE con_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{conName}, '%')
AND lec_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{lecName}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contents_manage (con_num, lec_num, con_name, description, video_id, con_play_time, lec_name, thumb_url) SELECT CONCAT('J', YEAR(NOW()), '-', LPAD(IFNULL(SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(CON_NUM), '-', -1), 0) + 1, 4, '0')) AS next_con_num, #{lecNum}, #{conName}, #{description}, #{videoId}, #{conPlayTime}, #{lecName}, #{thumbUrl} from contents_manage WHERE CON_NUM LIKE CONCAT('J', YEAR(NOW()), '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE contents_manage SET con_name = #{conName}, con_num = #{conNum}, con_play_time = #{conPlayTime}, description = #{description}, lec_num = #{lecNum}, lec_name = #{lecName}, video_id = #{videoId}, thumb_url = #{thumbUrl} where con_num = #{conNum};
mapper.select: SELECT con_num, lec_name, con_name, video_id, CONCAT( IF(HOUR(SEC_TO_TIME(con_play_time)) > 0, CONCAT(HOUR(SEC_TO_TIME(con_play_time)), '시간 '), ''), IF(MINUTE(SEC_TO_TIME(con_play_time)) > 0, CONCAT(MINUTE(SEC_TO_TIME(con_play_time)), '분 '), ''), IF(SECOND(SEC_TO_TIME(con_play_time)) > 0, CONCAT(SECOND(SEC_TO_TIME(con_play_time)), '초'), '') ) AS duration_time FROM contents_manage ORDER BY con_num DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{listSize}
